## `LogMessage`

Sends a message\index{log report!sending messages to} to program's logging system.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
LogMessage(string message)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
`string` message | The message to log.

### See also {-}

[`Debug.Print()`](#print)
:::
